video_prompt: Futuristic ninja swiftly moves, katana blade glowing blue. Dynamic action pose, transitioning from ready-to-strike to mid-slash. Luminous blue lines on suit and sword pulse with energy. Background blurs with shifting blue light, suggesting movement through a futuristic, high-tech environment. Small glowing particles drift and swirl.
image_prompt: Futuristic ninja in a sleek dark suit with glowing blue lines, wielding a glowing blue katana, striking a dynamic action pose against a dark, blurred background with blue lights and glowing particles. Dramatic lighting, sharp focus, dark tones contrasted with vibrant blue.
refined_video_prompt: A futuristic ninja swiftly transitions from a poised stance into a powerful, mid-air katana slash. Blue lines on the ninja's suit and the katana blade intensely pulse and glow with surging energy. The background dynamically blurs and shifts with streaks of blue light, suggesting rapid motion through a high-tech environment. Small, luminous particles continuously drift and swirl around the action.
